definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]

sentences.english: Get a fish drunk in Ohio.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州，不可以把魚灌醉。

sentences.english: Floodwaters are still rising after this week's heavy downpours across parts of Ohio .
sentences.chinese: 俄亥俄州部分地區本週連降暴雨，洪水仍在不斷上漲。

sentences.english: Gray was born in Canton, Ohio.
sentences.chinese: 格雷出生在俄亥俄的坎頓。

sentences.english: Avon Lake, Ohio school Address Telephone Fax arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 埃文湖，俄亥俄學校排名電話傳真網址。

sentences.english: This was the Cuyahoga River in Cleveland, Ohio.
sentences.chinese: 這是在克利夫蘭凱霍加河，俄亥俄。

sentences.english: Mr. Karras, a doctoral student in education at Ohio State.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州立大學攻讀教育學博士的卡拉斯先生。

sentences.english: The family moved west, to the city of Cincinnati, on the Ohio River.
sentences.chinese: 這家人繼續向西，來到俄亥俄河畔的辛辛那提。

sentences.english: First installation using rotary primary line switches (Elyria, Ohio).
sentences.chinese: 俄亥俄州伊利里亞市首次安裝使用旋轉第一級尋線機。

sentences.english: And the next day, he gave a speech in Ohio about faith.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，他還在俄亥俄州做一場關於信仰的演講。

sentences.english: That makes so much sense. How about Ohio attacking Kentucky?
sentences.chinese: 這使我浮想聯翩。俄亥俄攻擊肯塔基又如何？

sentences.english: There are no natural lakes in the state of Ohio , every one is manmade.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州內沒有天然湖泊，每一個都是人造湖。

sentences.english: The chief architect of post war Republican organizational strength into Ohio was Ray C. Bliss .
sentences.chinese: 戰後組織俄亥俄州共和黨力量的主將是雷兒布利斯。

sentences.english: Young has been Longman Professor of English at Oberlin College since 1986 since 1969. He lives in Oberlin, Ohio.
sentences.chinese: 他是歐柏林學院的英文教授，現居俄亥俄州歐柏林。

sentences.english: Ohio State and UCLA play their spots Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 週六俄亥俄州和利福尼亞大學洛杉磯分校進行比賽。

sentences.english: In Findlay, Ohio, hundreds remain in a shelter.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州的芬德雷市，有數百人還留在避難所。

definition: variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state
